content:
Compose a tweet that encourages people to come to a specific event.
Event name: Hackathon

🚀 Ready to unleash your creativity and coding skills? Join us at the Hackathon this weekend! 🌟 Collaborate, innovate, and compete with the brightest minds. Don't miss the chance to bring your ideas to life and win exciting prizes! 🏆 Register now and be part of something amazing! #Hackathon2023 #InnovateCreateParticipate
